column6: The historic first gathering of Earth's Mightiest Heroes continues here...chockfull of previously unknown details!  As Loki's plans escalate, five disparate heroes -- Iron Man, Thor, Ant-Man, the Wasp and the Hulk -- are caught up in events that just may be beyond their comprehension!  How do people react to these strange beings working together?  With guns drawn, that's how! Rated A  ...$3.99
column7: | Hank Pym | Hulk | Iron Man | Thor | Wasp
